props.title: Memory free
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.node.memoryFreeInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Swap used
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.node.swapUsedInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: CPU utilization
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.node.cpuUtilization`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Memory total
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.node.memoryTotalInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Swap total
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.node.swapTotalInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
